title: Jennifer Aniston is making an angry reaction to the break-up of Bringlina.
subtitle: A fake newspaper article mentioned that Jennifer Aniston made a damn note on today's show about Brad Pitt's divorce and Angelina Jolie.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Jennifer Aniston did an angry trick on today's show after she was asked about Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie's divorce.
